articles.author: Lex Harvey, Alex  Stambaugh, Antoinette Radford, Maureen Chowdhury, Aditi Sangal, Elise Hammond
articles.title: US strikes Iran-backed Houthis in Yemen: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: Israel has confirmed to American officials that Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar is dead, according to initial DNA testing, a person familiar with the matter said. Follow for live updates.
articles.content: US intelligence agencies were scrambling on Thursday morning to update their assessments of who is likely to succeed Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, who may have been killed in an Israeli operation overni… [+1908 chars]
